Retrieves the list of all wiki JSON objects from the database.

Retrieves wikis that match the given description.

Retrieves a wiki by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves the list of all wikis that matches the title.
Retrieves the list of all entries from the database.

Retrieves entries created on the given date.
Retrieves entry that matches exactly the given title.

Retrieves an entry by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an entry by its ID.

Retrieves entries associated with a specific Wiki ID.
Retrieves a list of all comments.

Retrieves a comment by its content.

Retrieves a comment by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes all comments associated with a specific version.

put.description: Updates a comment by its ID. Expects a JSON object in the request body.

get.description: Retrieves the list of all version JSON objects from the database.

post.description: Creates a new version. Expects a JSON object in the request body.

Retrieves a version by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a version by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all media files from the database.

post.description: Uploads a new media file to Cloudinary and stores media info in the database.

get.description: Checks if the service is up
Retrieves a media file by its ID.

put.description: Updates a media file by its ID in Cloudinary and updates media info in the database.

delete.description: Deletes a media file by its ID from both Cloudinary and the database.

get.description: Retrieves a media file by its PublicID (filename).
